gloss: the middle region of the body of an arthropod between the head and the abdomen
the upper part of the human body or the front part of the body in animals; contains the face and brains
someone authorized to exercise the powers of sheriff in emergencies
being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north
a chain formerly worn at the waist by women; for carrying a purse or bunch of keys etc.
a brief abstract (as of an article or book)
a rounded part of a cylindrical instrument (usually at one end)
conclusive in a process or progression
(usually plural) a part of a fruit or vegetable that is pared or cut off; especially the skin or peel
relating to or situated in or extending toward the middle
